trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class indicates that access control for the requests be interpreted as though the requests are performed by the security principal identified by the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> 類別 (Class) 指示要求的存取控制可按照如同由 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> 屬性識別的安全性原則所執行的要求一樣的方式來解釋。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> 建構函式使用指定的參數，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> property contains the security principal.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method transforms an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object into its DSML v2 XML representation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> 方法會將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 物件變換成其 DSML v2 XML 表示。
經過轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件。
